mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO cutting_tools_scrap (
id,
tool_type,
material_num,
cause,
count,
time,
is_del,
customer_code,
custormer_name,
authorized_code,
authorized_name,
cutting_tool_code,
status,
consume_type ) VALUES (
#{id},
#{toolType},
#{materialNum},
#{cause},
#{count},
#{time},
#{isDel},
#{customerCode},
#{custormerName},
#{authorizedCode},
#{authorizedName},
#{cuttingToolCode},
#{status},
#{consumeType} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cutting_tools_scrap WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
UPDATE cutting_tools_scrap SET is_del = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE cutting_tools_scrap SET
tool_type = #{toolType},
material_num = #{materialNum},
cause = #{cause},
count = #{count},
time = #{time},
is_del = #{isDel},
customer_code = #{customerCode},
custormer_name = #{custormerName},
authorized_code = #{authorizedCode},
authorized_name = #{authorizedName},
cutting_tool_code = #{cuttingToolCode},
status = #{status},
consume_type = #{consumeType},
id = #{id} WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
